home.description:
Pfanner stands for one family, one company,
one brand and one philosophy: to give our best,
to produce high-quality products from the gifts of nature.
People and their needs are at the center of this philosophy.

Through Pfanner's digital orchard, you will get to know new and rare 
varieties that are rarely found on the shelves anymore.
With this orchard we contribute to the preservation of these varieties and want to provide you with information about them.
information about the varieties. Maybe you will find one or the other variety
even later in your garden.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.inhaber: Media owner, contact and registered office
imprint.gesellschaftText: Chamber of Commerce Vorarlberg, FV food and luxury food industry, LG agricultural trade, LI food trade
imprint.gewerbe: Trade, trade authority, applicable legal provisions and company object
imprint.gewerbeText1: Industrial utilization of fruits and vegetables; commercial trade and commercial agent;
imprint.gewerbeText4: Trade regulations in the current version (available at www.ris.bka.gv.at)
imprint.gewerbeText5: Consumers have the option of submitting complaints to the EU's online dispute resolution platform: http://ec.europa.eu/odr. You can also address any complaints to the above email address.
imprint.blattText: Information about non-alcoholic and alcoholic beverages and their raw materials.
imprint.urheberText: All images, recordings and text content on this website are subject to copyright. Any reproduction, distribution or any other type of use of the material requires the express prior written consent of the author.
imprint.haftungText: The information on this website was created to the best of our knowledge and belief. However, we do not assume any liability for the correctness and completeness of the information provided. Liability claims caused by the use of incorrect and incomplete information are generally excluded.
imprint.haftungExtern: Limitation of Liability for External Links
imprint.haftungExternText: Our website contains links to other websites. Since we have no influence on their content, no liability can be assumed for the external content. The respective operator is always responsible for the content and topicality of the linked pages. As soon as we become aware of an infringement, we will remove the respective link immediately.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.verarbeitung: Consent to the processing of personal data
privacy.verarbeitungText1: Personal data within the meaning of the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is any information relating to a natural and identifiable person. Data processing is any process (e.g. collection, recording or storage) that is carried out with this data.
privacy.verarbeitungText2: Any contact with PFANNER, whether by e-mail, telephone, post, fax or website contact form/application form, will (possibly also) transmit personal data to PFANNER for processing. This usually involves at least contact details such as the name and address of the sender.
privacy.verarbeitungText3: By corresponding with PFANNER and the associated disclosure of personal data, you expressly consent to the processing of this disclosed personal data by PFANNER and the transmission of such data to companies in the PFANNER Group. This consent to the processing of personal data is voluntary and independent of the fulfillment of a contract. If you disclose personal data of third parties, PFANNER assumes that you are entitled to consent to the processing of this. PFANNER will process the personal data exclusively for the respective purpose resulting from the correspondence and will delete it again after the purpose has been achieved or upon request, provided that there are no legal retention periods to the contrary. This consent can be revoked at any time and informally.
privacy.verarbeitungText4: If you do not agree to the processing of the personal data you have provided or if it is personal data of third parties and you do not have the authorization to consent to the processing of this, we ask you to refrain from transmitting such data.
privacy.dsgvo: Information according to Art. 13 EU General Data Protection Regulation
privacy.dsgvoText1: PFANNER as responsible for the data processing activities is:
privacy.dsgvoText2: with the managing directors Ing. Hermann Pfanner, Mag. Peter Pfanner, Mag. Johann Lanzinger, Manfred Boch and Ing. Günter Feusthuber as representatives.
privacy.dsgvoText3: The data processing serves exclusively the purpose(s) pursued with the respective correspondence. Data processing takes place exclusively within the meaning of Art. 6 GDPR to fulfill legal obligations, to fulfill contracts or on the basis of the above consent to processing. This consent to the processing of personal data can be revoked at any time.
privacy.dsgvoText4: The processed personal data will be processed for the duration of the purpose and then deleted again. In the case of business case-related personal data, these are stored in accordance with the tax retention periods. All other personal data will only be kept for the duration required for the respective processing purpose. Personal data will be deleted at the latest after all statutory retention periods have expired. If data is transmitted via the website using a form, the data provided will be stored for six months for the purpose of processing and in the event of follow-up questions.
privacy.dsgvoText5: Upon written request, all personal data relating to the person concerned and processed by PFANNER will be disclosed and the person concerned will be comprehensively informed about the data processing of the data mentioned.
privacy.dsgvoText6: If incorrect personal data is processed at PFANNER, it will be corrected by means of an informal written request. Please contact office(@)pfanner.com.
privacy.dsgvoText7: If the consent to the processing of personal data is revoked, the personal data will be deleted, unless there are legal storage obligations or obligations from concluded contracts. The processing of personal data before receipt of the revocation is not affected.
privacy.dsgvoText8: A transfer of personal data to third parties is not intended. However, it may result from the purpose of the data processing that a transfer to other companies in the PFANNER Group is necessary and will be carried out. There is no transfer of personal data to recipients in third countries.
privacy.dsgvoText9: You have the right to limit the processing of your personal data to certain specified purposes by sending an informal letter to PFANNER.
privacy.dsgvoText10: If you believe that PFANNER is not properly fulfilling its obligations under data protection law or that your data protection claims have otherwise been violated in any way, you can complain to the data protection authority.
privacy.cookiesText: The website uses so-called cookies to optimize the page content. These are text files that are stored on your computer and enable us to analyze the use of the website. For this purpose, the usage information generated by the cookie (including your shortened IP address) is transmitted to our server and stored for usage analysis. The information generated by the cookie about your use of this website will not be passed on to third parties. You can prevent the use of cookies by setting your browser software accordingly. In this case, however, it is possible that you will not be able to use all the functions of this website to their full extent.
privacy.gaText: The website uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google Inc. ("Google"). Google Analytics uses so-called "cookies". The information generated by these cookies about your use of this website is transmitted to a Google server and stored there. On behalf of the operator of this website, Google will use this information to evaluate your use of the website, to compile reports on website activity and to provide other services related to website activity and internet usage to the website operator. You can prevent the storage of cookies by setting your browser software accordingly; we would like to point out to you however that in this case you will not be able to use all functions of this website in full. You can also prevent Google from collecting the data generated by the cookie and related to your use of the website (including your IP address) and from processing this data by Google by clicking on the following link (http:// tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout?hl=de) and install the available browser plugin. You can find more information on terms of use and data protection at http://www.google.com/analytics/terms/de.html or at https://www.google.de/intl/de/policies/. Furthermore, the website uses a so-called Google advertising function, which enables the creation of Google Analytics reports based on demographic characteristics and interests. For this purpose, information from both Google cookies and third-party cookies is used for analysis. However, all data is made available to us anonymously, so that it is not possible to draw conclusions about specific users. If you do not agree to the use of the stored cookies in this way, you can completely prevent the storage of cookies by setting your browser software accordingly or by installing the browser plug-in already mentioned to prevent the analysis of your usage behavior by Google Analytics.
privacy.socialText: Plugins from the social networks Facebook, YouTube and Instagram are integrated on the PFANNER website. The plugins can be recognized by the respective logos or the "Like button" ("Like") on the website. When you visit the website, the plugin establishes a direct connection between your browser and the servers of these social networks the information that you are visiting our site with your IP address is transmitted.If you click on a "Like" button while you are logged into your respective account, you can post the contents of our pages on your profile.This allows the respective social Network link the visit to our pages with the user account. We would like to point out that we, as the provider of the website, have no knowledge of the content of the data transmitted to and their use by the social networks. Further information on this can be found in the data protection declarations of the social networks under de -de.facebook.com/policy.php, https://www.youtube.de/t/privacy or https://help.instagram.com/519522125107875 If you do not want these social networks to be able to assign your visit to the PFANNER pages to your user account, please log out of your respective user account.
